TLINE.TDLINE: This section explains how to manage prompts for Genie features, ensuring
optimal performance and traceability.
Prompt Maintenance:
The admin user can maintain prompts for different Genie features within
this node. To maintain prompt history and traceability, we recommend the
following best practices:
Avoid Modification or Deletion: Refrain from modifying or deleting
existing prompts. This preserves a clear history of prompt evolution and
helps track changes over time.
Disable Obsolete Prompts: Instead of deleting outdated prompts, disable
them. This ensures that they are no longer used but remain accessible
for reference.
Add New Prompts with Sequencing: When adding new or improved prompts for
a feature, assign them the next sequential number. This maintains a
logical order and facilitates version control.
Prompt Improvement and Updates:
The Genie team continually works on refining and improving prompts to
enhance the accuracy and effectiveness of model responses. These
improved prompts will be communicated to customers periodically. Admin
user can then add these new prompts to the system, following the best
practices outlined above.
By adhering to these guidelines, admin user can ensure a well-organized
and traceable prompt repository, maximizing the performance and
efficiency of Genie's AI features.
